column6: 2015 at the age of 61. dear husband of kathleen. cherished son of john sr.& elizabeth. devoted brother of betty (fred) sprauer . survived by many loving and dear friends. john was the president of the board of trustees for the south huntington library and trustee of the suffolk county library association. john was active in local community theater. church time to be announced. upcoming events. monday visitation. jun 15. 2:00 pm - 4:00 pm a. l. jacobsen funeral home
column7: inc. 1380 new york avenue. huntington station
